txt.en: Tower of Orthanc: Rings of Fire and Frost -- Tier 2

Two Dunlending brothers, trusted by Saruman of Many Colours, received lesser rings of power from their master as a reward for their unswerving service. Now, imbued with the powers of fire and ice, they have grown into terrible monsters.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 in the fire and ice wing of the Tower of Orthanc Raid.</rgb>
Claim the Rings of Fire and Frost
